heroData.title:
Hi, I'm
Nathan
Casarez...
heroData.subTitle:
A software engineer based
in Los Angeles, CA

aboutRight.aboutText: I specialize in crafting extraordinary digital experiences that drive value for users and businesses alike. Whether you're looking for a simple website, or a full-fledged web app with robust features, I offer a range of services to take your web presence to new heights.

archivement.text: Drawing on 7+ years working with the web in various roles, I can support you at any stage in your project cycle, from planning and layout design to site deployment and beyond.
My tech stack includes HTML5, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript and React on the front end, along with Node.js, Express, MongoDB and PostgreSQL on the server side.

aboutRight.note: “Computers aren’t the thing. They are the thing that gets us to the thing.” — Joe MacMillan, Halt and Catch Fire, S1

experienceData.text: As a developer with a background in benefits communication, I strive to build web experiences that resonate with users as people first. In previous roles I've helped clients transform technical benefits topics into digital content that empowers.

serviceData.title: Static Websites
serviceData.heading: Get a simple, straightforward website off the ground quickly.
serviceData.text:
My static website development services are perfect for creating simple, reliable sites that can be developed and deployed swiftly. This is ideal for blogs, portfolios, landing pages and multi-page business websites. Your site will be built with scalability in mind, so it can adapt to changes as your business evolves.

If you need a domain, I'll help you secure your hosting solution based on the scale of your project. I'll also provide options for SSL/TLS certification so that your brand-new site meets the latest web security standards.

As an added service, you may opt for a monthly retainer if your website needs regular updates after launch.

serviceData.title: E-commerce
serviceData.heading: Unleash your online retail potential with my Shopify and full-stack services.
serviceData.text:
Online retail sales are estimated to exceed $6.3 trillion USD worldwide in 2024 — and they're expected to reach new heights in the coming years.

Whether you need a user-facing storefront, or a custom full-stack solution, I'll ensure a seamless online shopping experience that attracts customers and keeps them coming back. I mainly use the Shopify platform because of its easy setup and scalability, but we can discuss alternatives if you prefer other platforms like WooCommerce or Squarespace.

No matter which e-commerce option you go with, you'll enjoy features like secure payment processing, inventory management and order tracking.

serviceData.title: WordPress
serviceData.heading: Set up your website on the world's most popular content management platform.
serviceData.text:
WordPress powers nearly a third of the Internet, from small blogs to the websites of major corporations like Sony, Time and NBC. It's the most popular CMS platform in the world and is widely known for being highly customizable, cost-effective and SEO-friendly (meaning your site will rank on Google and other search engines!).

If you're looking for help setting up a WordPress site, I can build you a template-based site or a custom one from the ground up. Have an existing site that you want to migrate over to a new WordPress theme? I'll ensure the process goes as smoothly as possible with nothing lost in between.

serviceData.title: Web Maintenance
serviceData.heading: Need someone to keep your website up to date? Let me take care of it.
serviceData.text:
I offer web maintenance services to help you keep your website up to date, hassle-free. Let's discuss setting up a monthly retainer fee depending on the size of your website and the expected changes you plan to make. I'll be on hand to manage everything from security updates and performance tweaks to content changes, image revisions, or adding new pages.

Just contact me by email, and I've got you covered.

paragraphList.text: A full-stack web application built on React and Next.js. It features stunning restaurant and bar visuals, along with back-end functionality to capture dinner reservation data, blog comments and contact form submissions.

NASA is recognized around the world, but not everyone knows the full picture of what they do. This web app fetches data from NASA's APIs to offer a glimpse into the agency. It is built on HTML, CSS and client-side JavaScript.

This web app lets you search providers to find where certain titles are streaming for free or by subscription. It also features hundreds of smaller services that you can’t find through other search engines. Results are tailored to your general location.

A static landing page for Ayesha Hair Salon built from a graphic designer's layout with only HTML and CSS. It features high-res imagery to achieve a 'magazine-like' design, including a masonry gallery that takes advantage of CSS grid.
